question: Which is the only country to register a 3-digit growth in the wearable market, as per the recent report of IDC?
explanation:
The International Data Corporation (IDC) released a report titled “Worldwide quarterly wearable device tracker’.
As per the report, India is the only country to register a 3-digit growth in the wearable market, with a year-on-year growth of a 144.3 percent in 2020. A total of 36.4-million-unit wearable shipments were registered in the country in 2020.
